Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.MessagesToClient

Class MessageToClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.MessagesToClient.MessageToClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActivateLeaderCardMessage, ActivateProductionMessage, AddMessage, BoughtCardMessage, BuyCardMessage, CheatMessage, ChoseCardSlotMessage, ChoseLeaderCardMessage, ChoseMarketRowMessage, ChoseProductionOutputMessage, DiscardLeaderCardMessage, DisconnectedMessage, EndMarketMessage, EndProductionMessage, EndTurnMessage, EndTurnSingleplayerMessage, ExceptionMessage, FinalPointsMessage, GameSetMessage, InitChoseLeaderCardsMessage, InitChoseResourcesMessage, PaymentMessage, ResetWarehouseMessage, SwitchDepotMessage
public class MessageToClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
MessageToClient Class defines a generic message to be sent to the Client (via the Serializable Java interface).

Attributes:

  • ActionType "actionDone": indicates the Action which created this particular instance
  • ArrayList<ActionType> "possibleActions": contains new possible actions which the player can execute after receiving a new MessageToClient (only if the message does not contain an error statement)
  • String "error": contains the Controller response after checking if the Action requested by the player was actually doable
  • String "playerNickname": contains the name of the player who performed the Action.
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public void updateView​(UserInteraction userInteraction) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Updates the Client's reduced model so that the player can see changes made to the Model's game.
      Parameters:
      userInteraction - Class containing the instance of the reduced Game seen by the player.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if different conditions are met, depending on the Overridden subclass method.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer​(UserInteraction userInteraction) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Finds the Player who performed the Action inside the reduced Game's list of players.
      Parameters:
      userInteraction - Class containing the instance of the reduced Game seen by the player.
      Returns:
      the Player who performed the action.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if there are no player with a nickname equal to this.playerNickname.

    • success

      protected boolean success()
      Checks if the MessageToClient contains an error statement.
      Returns:
      true if this.error is equal to a success statement.

    • imPlaying

      public boolean imPlaying​(UserInteraction userInteraction)
      Checks if the player who received the message was the one playing the current turn.
      Parameters:
      userInteraction - UserInteraction of the player's View.
      Returns:
      true if the player has to continue his turn.
